verses.name: Leviticus 6:21
verses.text: In a pan it shall be made with oil; and when it is baken, thou shalt bring it in: and the baken pieces of the meat offering shalt thou offer for a sweet savour unto the Lord.

verses.name: Leviticus 6:22
verses.text: And the priest of his sons that is anointed in his stead shall offer it: it is a statute for ever unto the Lord; it shall be wholly burnt.

verses.name: Leviticus 6:23
verses.text: For every meat offering for the priest shall be wholly burnt: it shall not be eaten.

verses.name: Leviticus 6:24
verses.text: And the Lord spake unto Moses, saying,
